im:artist.label: Chengdu Everimaging Science and Technology Co., Ltd

title.label: Fotor Photo Editor - Chengdu Everimaging Science and Technology Co., Ltd

content.label: This update includes a new POPUP Ad for GoART which on a dual screen setip CANNOT be closed, so now I cannot use the Fotor Photo Editor.   Are you guys insane?  I am slowly being pushed away from using your app, this is super frustrating.  Find another / better way to push your products, but popups that are poorly executed are killing the vibe.

title.label: Just wanted to Edit a photo

content.label: But this seems to take over my Mac. anyone know how to get rid of it?

title.label: Probably perfect for someone who knows nothing about photo editing

content.label:
This application is so rigid in terms of how you do what it allows you to do that unless you are happy to use it’s preset tools and collage features, want only to use its selection of very simple tools for color correction, etc., it is useless.

I gave it 3 Stars because I suspect that if you know nothing at all about photography or photo editing that it is fantastic at producing slick looking collages, and the kind of simple stuff people might want for making a family photo album, etc.

But if you have ever worked with Photoshop, and particularly if you have been paid to do so, it is utterly useless. 

The product should be labelled as being for those with no knowledge or experience of photography, or photo editing, or of color correction. 

If you do not know what a gamma curve is, or a white point, then this is the product for you.

Otherwise it is infuriatingly rigid, and assumes that you know absolutely nothing about photo editing, compositing, colour correction, etc. When I first started using it I got quite angry, I felt that it’s makers assumed I was an idiot. What instead they assumed is that users know nothing about photography, etc.

Probably great for someone who wants to make a pretty, professional looking photo album, or series of photographs for printing, and who doesn’t want to have to think about what they are doing at all. Otherwise so idiot proof as to be useless.

This is why the ratings are so polarised, I think. I split the difference.

Hence not a one star, and not a five, but Three (3) Stars.

Ach, what a shame! Since I updated to Sierra 10.12.2, this great wee app has stopped working. Clearly a bug. Editing is fine but I can’t now save any of my work. The app simply won’t browse for a suitable file location and just hangs meaning a force close.

Pity, ‘cos until today I loved this application.

title.label: will not let me save and crashes!

content.label: Looks good but everytime I try to save it crashes - so useless

I have the same issue as another reviewer. When I try to browse to save my edited photo, the app crashes. Seems to be every other photo. So I can edit/save one photo, then on the next try the app crashes and I have to restart it. Frustrating but will have to keep using for now as they have nice effects. But I do wish the developers would sort it out...

I still use this, it is simple and quick.  However, I’ve just had to uninstall and reinstall to try and solve a buggy issue with the font size being stuck on a massive 288 (nothing I did got rid of this, if I tried to edit the text it just disappeared!) Hoping my reinstall will solve it . . . ALSO, there used to be some GREAT filters . . . for some reason, these were removed and are no longer options.  The “light trails” filter was especially effective.

If the developer reads this - please reintroduce those original filters!

UPDATE : My re-install did not work, font sizing and in fact doing anything with fonts appears to be broken!! FIX IT.

Ta.

title.label: Brilliant app, bugged since last update

content.label:
Brilliant app. Since last update bugged - when exporting photo -> clicking browse to select file location it completely bugs and have to force close.

Please fix!!

This was wonderful for different effects and adding text, albeit with the limitation that you couldn’t save in a layered format. However, since the recent upgrade, the edges of text becomes uneven when I export. As a result text looks blurry from a distance. And I get this regardless of what resolution or format I export under. Very disappointed.

And I went onto their support site to try and get help, but it kept saying I had entered the Capta form incorrectly, so I was unable to submit a request for help. Very frustrated.

title.label: This version doesn’t allow you to save images !!!

content.label:
Help..I loved this app for simple phot editing for the web.  I upgraded thinking that all upgrades will be improvements only to find that two major functions are no longer working.

1.  Saving images
2.  Applying text and moving the text to where I wanted it on the image 

How can I restore this to what used to be a beautiful, simple and very functional app.
Thanks

Just downloaded the new version (3.0.1 and using OSX 10.11.1).  Entered text as usual then tried to move the text box around - just refused to go anywhere.  Tried to report the fault to Fotor and the message refused to send.  I am not at all happy - this is a good simple editor app, please restore to its former glory!!
It worked perfectly until new version - Now IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO SAVE PHOTO after editing (Failed to save photo/collage).
Stil not good. Is it possible to get everything back as it was in version 2???

After updating this new version of Fotor i am facing a new problem. After selecting a photo to edit & ending of editing when i went to save the photo then the new edited fotor picture was not export as  before it was. After saving the picture when i checked it where the [icture i saved i found its size is about 286 kb not as usual as before like 15 mb & even it wasn’t a picture it is like a black background or something else. i am facing this problem on edit & batch section werether the collage section is ok….so what i have to do to solve the problem of export photo from edit & batch section ??

This used to be an excellent editing app.  Now all of the effects have been changed to the one’s in the online version (which are all terrible) and all of the effects I used on a regular basis are now gone.  Please change them back!!!
For a free app you cannot fault this. It does loads of effects which take ages in Photoshop and is much more fun.
Good app with lots of free features BUT worthless as it keeps crashing new release ASAP please

title.label: Simple app makes photos look even better

content.label:
Although I’d like to be using enthusiast tools such as Lightroom or Photoshop, I find the learning curve quite steep. With Fotor I can do a fair amount of photo editing which really makes the colours pop - something between your super simple Instagram filter and Lightroom.

Only thing I’d like to see is the ability to apply settings to areas of the photo, such as lightening up just the sky for example.

Love the app, my fav photo editing app for mac. Easy to use. But please fix the crashing issue, annoying when mid way through an edit. Also an a vignette style after choosing a filter like instagram lets you
Simply an excellent and amazing app. Well done guys for making my photo editing so easy and classical.
You work on adding text to a photo, then try and export but it crashes. Restart then same thing happens.

I've had this for a long time now. I can't update cause i have to have version 10.7 now. allows me to edit one picture then crashes. shouldn't  have to be forced to update my mac to be able to use this. before i could do nothing but praise this software. now im disappointed

having looked on the app store i was glad to see this…now im glad to see the back of it! ok its free i shouldnt complain but i have done much better pictures on my phone and it saves. I have tried many times and re started the computer yet still it wont save so a total waste of time.

I have used this a couple of times to edit phots and place text on and do other effects. It is simple, intuitive and very powerful.
There is a but, that it appears to be “buggy” in that in crashes after sharing to Facebook and then returning to the picture, there doesn’t seem to be a button for returning to your picture unless you are supposed to just click on your picture again to cancel the share, but that is when it crashed for me. 
Other than that it works very well and was very simple to edit and change anything I wanted. 
Love the borders and effects to change to colours as they are all useful.
Keep up the good work but please sor tout the bug - thanks.
It is a simple program to use, a must have on the MAC.
Had it for ages but never used it, until now. Damn this app is good. I love it!

This app does not really offer anything extra to what your phone apps can do ... 
it's very basic, some filters and tools and that's all.

This is a really cool app, i always use this for editing pics and then uploading it onto facebook, instagram etc :)
would rate it 200 out of 100 ;)
really good program, but needs an option of a 16-9 ratio on making collages for todays wide screen macs, hope they make an update for this soon.

title.label: What an excellent, easy to use photo editor

content.label: This is an awesome piece of software.  It lets me play about with my photos without needing to know too much - it's very user-friendly but gives a very professional looking end product.  It doesn't take long to navigate your way around with it and within 5 minutes you're producing excellent results.  I'm relatively new to taking photographs - have been a happy snapper for years but have just started out with a half-decent camera but needed something to add a bit of polish.  The plethora of editing software is mind-numbing but Fotor let me dip a toe in the water and I'm delighted with my results so far.

I absolutely love this app and is my go to. However, I would like to see a ‘Splash’ effect, it’s where it converts your photo to black and white and lets you add colour to areas you want, such as adding colour to the petals of the flower and the background is black and white. That would make it 5 stars for me.
Great app, quickly let's you edit and add text to photos and images really easily. Simple to use and very user-friendly interface.
So easy to get great results. Fun to use and now a much cherished addition to my photography armoury.
I love the simplicity of it and the variety of  filters available. i can constantly editing photos with it, love the fact you can batch edit them

I love this app, I helps me lift my photos. I take a lot of photos of jewellery and its quite difficult to get the light right. With this app I can adjust the background apperance and lights so I can make my Jewellery sparke more!
Being a newbie to photo editing, this app is perfect. Easy to use and extremely powerful and improves any photo you throw at it!
Really easy to use and it works perfectly! Ideal if you want to make your pictures better or more arty. Definitely recommend!!

Fotor app you have done well i thought there was nothing like it on mac i edit my picgtues for facebook instagram and just for fun. 
Please make more updates and make this app more special but of course it is special.
I really like this app i hope you see this comet

ps:i share this app with my friends too!

title.label: Great motivating tool for new commers :-)

content.label: as a pre-amature photographer , this tool is just so motivating and helpful when it comes to photo editing. thanks guys
fotor is very simple to use and i like the different effects that it comes with, i found this app very professional when it comes to photos. Definitely going to stay on my mac for a long time

This app has been wonderful to use and has helped me a edit a lot of photos that looked pixelated. I am 100% pleased with the outcomes of the photos after using this app and would recommend it to anyone from amateurs to professionals.

I often need to quickly edit a photo and add some text and this app is just perfect. Has lots of easy to use options and is very user friendly. Never had any problems working anything out. Thought I was going to have to pay big bucks for something like this but must’ve created some good karma for this app to appear :-)
Really simple and effective product, easily transforms old photographs into something special and the framing and collage tools are very good.  Definitely recommended.

I found Fotor very easy to use and extremelly helpfull with editing landscape photographs. I love the amount of different effects added to the new version and know that i will continue using it as long as i’m interested in photography. Only thing i would change is the saving option, wish it could remember previous folders. Overall a great app for any photo quality and taste!

I downloaded this app a while ago as just something to use for basic image manipulation although I have found myself using it more than products that cost much, much more! it is a very powerful tool with great options for changing!

I have used the previous version of this software for several months without problems. However, the new version is a disaster: when I have finished editing a photo and try to save the changes, I click on the “browse” button and Fotor locks up. It can’t even be shut down; I have to manually switch off the power to the computer and restart it. 

They need to sort this bug out fast, because the current system is worse than useless.

Cannot find it anywhere on my machine, download took ten minutes and apparantly installed but where?
Not in Applications, download or utilities, search does not reveal!?
Is this spyware?
It was fine before this update, now it crashes every time I attempt to add an effect.  I haven’t been able to use it at all.  The star rating reflects this.  I would have given it a 3 or 4 otherwise

just downloaded this (can’t beleive how difficult it is to get a decent photo editing/printing app. - even hp can’t come up with one!) and ran it for the first time. first impressions are important, right?! well, it was (painfully) slow and, with 4 photos in a reg. layout, crashed trying to change aspect ratio from 1:1 to 3:4 - oh dear!
It’s really useful! I use it all the time for my blog! It is easy to use and just amazing!
